transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hi sir, good evening. Good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon ji, boliye.
Customer: Aap bhi after office se baat kar rahe ho na?
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Sir main Roshan baat kar raha hoon IndiaMART ke office se. Kaise hain aap?
Executive: Ji badhiya, bataiye.
Customer: Hamari discussion hui thi na sir?
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Aapko yaad hoga ki aapko legal team ke saath mein aapne discuss karna tha ki isko kaise wo
Executive: Ji baat kiya maine unse, lekin wo unko kuch idea nahi hai us baare mein.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Wo bol rahe hain agar nahi chal raha hai to subscription rok do aur wo payment refund le lo, band kar do bol rahe hain wo.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Chaliye ek baar main discussion kar leta hoon.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Jaisa hota hai main aapko batata hoon.
Executive: Ji, agar koi problem aa rahi hai to band karke uska kya refund hota hai wo dekh lo.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Band kar denge, waisa koi masla nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Legal team is unaware of the previously discussed issue.
- Advised by legal team to stop the subscription and get a refund.
- Wants to close the service and get a refund if issues persist.


Resolution:

- Will discuss the matter internally.
- Will update the customer on the outcome.


Next Steps: 
- Issue not resolved.
- Executive to discuss internally and update the customer.

Alert (If Any):
- refund

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral | Risk of churn -> Risk of churn

@@@Key Topics:
- subscription, refund, legal team, service closure
